summary: The core logic and domain models for the VastLab GPU management library. It provides a programmatic interface for interacting with Vast.ai, managing local instance registries, and orchestrating remote provisioning and training workflows.
responsibilities: Manage the lifecycle of GPU instances (start, stop, destroy, search) via Vast.ai REST API.
Orchestrate remote provisioning including PyTorch, Jupyter, and system package installation.
Handle secure SSH connection management, port forwarding, and secret injection.
Maintain a local SQLite-backed registry of instances and their metadata.
Manage file transfers and recursive directory synchronization using zip and rsync.
Synchronize privacy-safe instance snapshots with the VastLab Cloud backend.
Detect project dependencies and execute training jobs in remote tmux sessions.
